amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 4125 from the bill which eliminates an existing consumer right to recover costs due to manufacturer misrepresentation of EnergyStar products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 660).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 660).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Schakowsky.
